title: Statue Of Liberty National Monument: Contact Public Affairs
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     Contact Public Affairs              Contact Public Affairs         A replica of Lady Liberty's face as it originally appeared to the public when first unveiled in 1886. This replica is located in the museum exhibit within the Statue of Liberty's pedestal. NPS Photo  Statue of Liberty National Monument is a national park which encompasses both Liberty Island, site of the Statue of Liberty, and Ellis Island, home of the Ellis Island Museum of Immigration. The park's Public Affairs Office is responsible for media affairs on both islands. For information on news stories regarding the park: Email us Phone: 646-356-2105 Mailing address: Statue of Liberty National Monument c/o Public Affairs Office New York, New York 10004
